name: Aufeis / Icing Impacts
functionStatement: Low flow and baseflow dynamics ensure habitat availability and water quality during low water levels and indicate non-storm conditions experienced the majority of the time.
descriptionMarkdown: Aufeis (icing) formation and extent near the project reach. Changes in aufeis can indicate altered groundwater/surface water interactions and land disturbance.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field screening and/or Desktop (flow records/imagery)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map aufeis presence/extent using winter imagery and/or field observations and assess proximity to the project reach per the metric definition. Assign the condition class using the bin thresholds for this metric.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is minor or nonexistent within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found upstream of the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is moderate within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found within 1 kilometer (0.62 miles) upstream of the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.50-0.69)

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is moderate within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found within 1 kilometer (0.62 miles) upstream of the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.30-0.49)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is extensive within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found within 1 kilometer (0.62 miles) upstream of the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.29)

bin1.name: Poor
bin1.desc: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is extensive within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found within 1 kilometer (0.62 miles) upstream of the project reach.

bin2.name: Fair
bin2.desc: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is moderate within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found within 1 kilometer (0.62 miles) upstream of the project reach.

bin3.name: Good
bin3.desc: Aufeis formation caused by land disturbance is minor or nonexistent within, extends into the reach from downstream, or is found upstream of the project reach.
